Class HttpOvalRepositoryClient

java.lang.Object
  jp.go.aist.six.oval.core.web.HttpOvalRepositoryClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
OvalDefinitionRepository, OvalRepository, OvalResultRepository
public class HttpOvalRepositoryClient
extends Object
implements OvalRepository

An implementation of OvalRepository using MongoDB.
